title: A swipe to the right launches phone 'settings'.
body: It is more convenient to go with swiping gestures is more fun being with than the tap method. However, there should be more of swipe gestures than the tap methods. To set a difference a swipe to the right should launch 'settings' menu, as a swipe to the left launches the 'apps list'.

comments.body: Microsoft and Microsoft Oy, please, do something about this, 'cause it is a cool idea.
This is cool, if looked into.
